Title: Requires each town, village, and city to develop a "housing action plan for everyone"
Summary: Requires each town, village, and city to develop a "housing action plan for everyone", including consideration of local needs and specific strategies to address those local needs.
LawCode: Add ยง28, Gen City L; add ยง272, Town L; add ยง7-720, Vil L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, the town law, and the village law, in relation to requiring each town, village, and city to develop a housing action plan for everyone
